promos.name: Yearly Subscription Payments
promos.description: Pay your subscription on a yearly basis and get 2 months of your subscription for free.

promos.name: +2k Rewards Cap worth 100 PLU
promos.description: Everyone that upgrades their stacking tier from the above mentioned date onwards will receive the #2k redemption cap (worth 100 PLU) for free on the 1st of the month following their upgrade and will last for 12months.

promos.name: +5k Rewards Cap
promos.description: All metal card holders will receive the #5k redemption cap (worth 300 PLU) for free starting in January 2024 and will remain active for 12months after the metal cards have been delivered.

promos.name: +10k Rewards Cap
promos.description: Everyone that upgraded their stacking tier to either Myth or HoneyBadger between the above mentioned dates will receive the #10k redemption cap (worth 500 PLU) for free for the entirety of 2024.

promos.name: +10k Rewards Cap
promos.description: Everyone that upgraded their stacking tier between the above mentioned dates will receive the #10k redemption cap (worth 500 PLU) for free for the entirety of 2024.

promos.name: +1k Rewards Cap
promos.description: Everyone that has been on a stacking tier before the above mentioned date will receive the #1k redemption cap (worth 50 PLU) for free for the entirety of 2024.

promos.name: 50% Rewards Cap Discount
promos.description: Everyone 50% discount on all redemption caps. There is currently no known end date so it will remain until further notice.
